summary: This is an internal memo from an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) in the Southern District of New York, dated September 29, 2021. It summarizes efforts to determine how many times a key witness (referred to as 'Jane Doe #2') was interviewed during the Florida investigation into Jeffrey Epstein, identifying one documented interview from August 2007 and noting uncertainty about additional interviews.

persons.name: Jane Doe #2
persons.context: Referred to as 'Jane Doe #2' and 'Victim-2', she is the subject of the memo's inquiry into how many times she was interviewed by the FBI during the Florida Epstein investigation. She indicated she could not recall if she met with agents once or twice.

persons.name: AUSA A
persons.context: An AUSA who reviewed the Florida FBI file on Relativity, identified notes and a 302 from an interview on or about August 7, 2007, and asked the witness about her recollection of interviews.

persons.name: AUSA B
persons.context: An AUSA who reviewed the SDFL file on Relativity and found no record of additional interviews with the witness.

persons.name: AUSA C
persons.context: An AUSA who took notes memorializing the witness's statement about not recalling the number of interviews and who asked an FBI Special Agent (SA) about her recollection.

connections.description: AUSA A was involved in reviewing records and inquiring about the number of interviews conducted with Jane Doe #2 during the Florida investigation.
SA was the FBI Special Agent who interviewed Jane Doe #2 and was later asked about the number of interviews conducted.
AUSA C asked SA about her recollection of interviewing Jane Doe #2 and memorialized the agent's statement.

events.title: Documented FBI Interview of Jane Doe #2
events.description: An interview of Jane Doe #2 (Victim-2) conducted by Florida FBI agents, documented in handwritten notes and an FBI 302 form.

events.title: Internal SDNY Memo on Interview Records
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York sends a memo summarizing efforts to identify all interviews of Jane Doe #2 during the Florida Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: The document confirms a single documented FBI interview of 'Jane Doe #2' (Victim-2) from the Florida Epstein investigation, occurring on or about August 7, 2007.
Extensive reviews of the Florida FBI file and the SDFL file on Relativity found no record of any additional interviews with this witness.
The witness herself could not recall whether she was interviewed once or twice by Florida FBI agents.

An FBI Special Agent involved also could not recall if there were additional interviews after August 2007, noting that follow-up interviews might not have been formally documented unless a new statement was made.
The memo illustrates ongoing investigative efforts by the SDNY in 2021 to reconstruct the historical record of the Florida investigation.
